summary: The module defines a collection of specialized data structures, enumerations, and a plotting helper used throughout the pulse‑visualization subsystem. It includes abstractions for chart coordinates, automatically updating text, label and line categories, symbol classifications, time‑unit constants, a generic waveform channel placeholder, and waveform data type enumeration, together with a Matplotlib‑based 2‑D plotter class.
business_intent: To provide a unified, configurable foundation for rendering quantum pulse schedules, ensuring consistent handling of coordinates, labels, symbols, time units, and waveform representations when visualizing pulse programs in Qiskit.
